content: as this is a free pattern should you enjoy it and wish to donate to my ko-fi you can do so here https //ko-fi com/vicecy pattern available at eden cottage yarns https //www edencottageyarns co uk/collections/patterns-for-dk-yarn/products/follifoot-digital-download a simple but cosy and practical pair of leg warmers ideal for keeping the ankles warm and dry this pattern uses one 100g/224m skein of dk yarn so is a handy stash buster too **materials** eden cottage yarns oakworth dk dk 100% superwash polwarth wool 220m / 245yds per 100g skein shade hazel one set of 4mm / us 6 double pointed needles or the size needed to obtain the correct gauge one stitch marker to mark beginning of round if required tapestry needle scissors **size** one size could be adapted by casting on more or fewer stitches finished circumference 27 - 40cm / 10 5 - 15 75 in length 24 5cm / 9 5 in quoted sizes are taken after washing but lightly blocked up to fully stretched **gauge** 22sts and 32 row to 10cm 4in over textured stitch in the round on 4mm us 6 needles after blocking **pattern notes** note these are worked in the round use whichever method you prefer for this *please note this pattern is un-tested and hasn t been professionally tech edited by a third party - that s why it is free *
